com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class ShapefileWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.ShapefileWriter
public class ShapefileWriter
extends Object

This class is used by MapObjects to create a shapefile. It is designed to connect MapObjects's feature model with that of the shapefile.

Constructor Summary
ShapefileWriter(String path, String name, int shpType)
          Creates a new shapefile.

public ShapefileWriter(String path,
                       String name,
                       int shpType)
                throws IOException,
                       ShpException
Creates a new shapefile.

Parameters:
path - file directory path
name - file name with the .shp extension
shpType - shape type
Throws:
ShpException - if a shape error occurs
IOException - if an I/O error occurs

writeFeatureClass

public static void writeFeatureClass(FeatureClass fClass,
                                     String path,
                                     String name)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ShpException
Creates a shapefile that contains all of the features of the given FeatureClass.

Parameters:
fClass - the FeatureClass to be written
path - file directory path for parent of the output shapefile
name - file name with the .shp extension of the output shapefile
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs
ShpException - if a Shape error occurs
See Also:
MapDataset, writeFeatureClass(com.esri.mo2.data.feat.FeatureClass,String,String,int)
